heading: This Afternoon
text: Chance of snow or rain showers; some freezing drizzle possible over high terrain.
temperature: Valleys low to mid 30s north, mid to upper 30s south

heading: Tonight
text: Chance of snow showers or patchy freezing drizzle north and in the southern Greens.

heading: Friday
text: Rising chance of morning rain showers in New York, mainly after noon elsewhere.
